title: LeaverBuster
body: **My pc is low ,look my history mach i dont leave one part ,pc shotdown and now started ,see LeaveBuster.. pls remove leavebuster look my history macth  (srry for my bad english..)**

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the issues you've been having with your pc.  :(  If it's shutting down, I would double check for overheating.  The system treats everyone equally, though, because it still causes others a negative experience.  I'm happy to troubleshoot if you'd like to offer more details, but it might be a good idea to test stuff out in custom games to prevent further penalties.
